targets.query: SELECT last("cpu_usagemhz_average") *1000*1000 AS "cpu", last("mem_active_average") AS "mem" FROM "virtualmachine" WHERE ("time" >= now()-2m) AND ("cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT last("virtualdisk_read_average") AS "read", last("virtualdisk_write_average") AS "write",last("virtualdisk_read_average") + last("virtualdisk_write_average") AS "total" FROM "virtualmachine" WHERE (time >= now() - 2m) AND ("cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/) GROUP BY "name"

SELECT last("net_bytesrx_average") AS "rx", last("net_bytestx_average") AS "tx", max("net_bytesrx_average") AS "rx_max", max("net_bytestx_average") AS "tx_max" FROM "virtualmachine" WHERE ("cluster" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hostsystem" WITH KEY = "cluster"
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "hostsystem" WITH KEY = "cluster"
